description: This Java source file defines a Spring Boot REST controller named RootController, which provides basic endpoints for verifying server health and readiness without external dependencies. The controller exposes two GET endpoints: '/' for a simple health check message and '/ready' for a readiness probe.

classes.name: RootController
classes.description: A Spring Boot REST controller providing basic server health and readiness endpoints.

methods.name: root
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/' and returns a simple greeting message indicating the server is running.

methods.name: ready
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/ready' and returns an HTTP 200 status indicating the service is ready.
